description: A classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, basil, and olive oil.
details: Pizza Margherita is an iconic Italian dish made with fresh ingredients and a thin, crispy crust.

instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Mix yeast, warm water, and salt; let sit for 5 minutes.
Add flour and knead into a dough, then let it rise for 30 minutes.
Roll out the dough, spread tomato sauce, and sprinkle mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until golden brown.
Garnish with fresh basil and drizzle olive oil before serving.

description: A selection of sushi rolls and sashimi, including salmon, tuna, and shrimp, served with soy sauce and wasabi.
details: Sushi is a traditional Japanese dish featuring vinegared rice combined with fresh seafood and vegetables.

instructions: Rinse sushi rice and cook with water.
Mix rice vinegar, sugar, and salt, then stir into the rice.
Place nori on a bamboo mat, spread rice evenly, and add fish slices.
Roll tightly and slice into pieces.
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

description: A juicy grilled beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and special sauce in a toasted bun.
details: An all-time favorite American dish, known for its rich flavors and satisfying texture.

instructions: Season the beef with salt and pepper, then form into a patty.
Grill the patty for 3-4 minutes per side.
Place cheese on top and let it melt.
Toast the bun and assemble the burger with lettuce, tomato, and sauces.
Serve with fries or coleslaw.

description: A flavorful rice dish cooked with aromatic spices, marinated chicken, and saffron.
details: Biryani is a fragrant and spicy dish that originated in India and is loved worldwide.

instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, turmeric, and garam masala for 1 hour.
Cook rice until half done, then set aside.
Fry onions in ghee until golden brown.
Layer rice and chicken in a pot, sprinkle saffron on top.
Cook on low heat for 20 minutes until fully cooked.
Garnish with fried onions and serve hot.

description: A creamy pasta dish made with eggs, pancetta, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.
details: Pad Thai is one of the most popular street foods in Thailand, offering a balance of sweet, sour, and spicy flavors.

instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta in olive oil until crispy.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan cheese together.
Mix spaghetti with pancetta, then add the egg mixture.
Stir well to create a creamy sauce, then season with black pepper.
Serve immediately with extra cheese on top.

description: Corn tortillas filled with marinated pork, pineapple, onions, and cilantro, served with salsa.
details: Pad Thai is one of the most popular street foods in Thailand, offering a balance of sweet, sour, and spicy flavors.

instructions: Marinate pork in pineapple juice, vinegar, and chili powder for 2 hours.
Grill the pork until crispy and charred.
Warm corn tortillas and fill them with pork, pineapple, onions, and cilantro.
Serve with salsa on the side.

description: A stir-fried noodle dish made with shrimp, tofu, egg, peanuts, and tamarind sauce.
details: Pad Thai is one of the most popular street foods in Thailand, offering a balance of sweet, sour, and spicy flavors.

Grill the patty for 3-4 minutes per side.
Place cheese on top and let it melt.
Toast the bun and assemble the burger with lettuce, tomato, and sauces.
Serve with fries or coleslaw.
